parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter forecasts by properties/usageDate (Utc time), properties/chargeType or properties/grain. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Forecast Config operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the dimensions by the defined scope.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter dimensions by properties/category, properties/usageStart, properties/usageEnd. Supported operators are 'eq','lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge'.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the properties/data within a dimension category. By default, data is not included when listing dimensions.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N dimension data.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the dimensions by the external cloud provider type.

parameters.description: May be used to filter dimensions by properties/category, properties/usageStart, properties/usageEnd. Supported operators are 'eq','lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge'.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: Skiptoken is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a skiptoken parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: May be used to limit the number of results to the most recent N dimension data.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ReportConfigDefinition.description: The definition of a report config.

type.description: The type of the report. Usage represents actual usage, forecast represents forecasted data and UsageAndForecast represents both usage and forecasted data. Actual usage and forecasted data can be differentiated based on dates.

timeframe.description: The time frame for pulling data for the report. If custom, then a specific time period must be provided.

timePeriod.description: Has time period for pulling data for the report.

dataset.description: Has definition for data in this report config.

ReportConfigTimePeriod.description: The start and end date for pulling data for the report.

from.description: The start date to pull data from.

to.description: The end date to pull data to.

ReportConfigDataset.description: The definition of data present in the report.

granularity.description: The granularity of rows in the report.

configuration.description: Has configuration information for the data in the report. The configuration will be ignored if aggregation and grouping are provided.

aggregation.description: Dictionary of aggregation expression to use in the report. The key of each item in the dictionary is the alias for the aggregated column. Report can have up to 2 aggregation clauses.

grouping.description: Array of group by expression to use in the report. Report can have up to 2 group by clauses.

sorting.description: Array of order by expression to use in the report.

filter.description: Has filter expression to use in the report.

ReportConfigDatasetConfiguration.description: The configuration of dataset in the report.

columns.description: Array of column names to be included in the report. Any valid report column name is allowed. If not provided, then report includes all columns.

ReportConfigAggregation.description: The aggregation expression to be used in the report.

name.description: The name of the column to aggregate.

function.description: The name of the aggregation function to use.

ReportConfigSorting.description: The order by expression to be used in the report.

name.description: The name of the column to sort.

ReportConfigGrouping.description: The group by expression to be used in the report.

type.description: Has type of the column to group.

name.description: The name of the column to group. This version supports subscription lowest possible grain.

ReportConfigFilter.description: The filter expression to be used in the report.

and.description: The logical "AND" expression. Must have at least 2 items.

or.description: The logical "OR" expression. Must have at least 2 items.

dimension.description: Has comparison expression for a dimension

tag.description: Has comparison expression for a tag

ReportConfigColumnType.description: The type of the column in the report.

ReportConfigComparisonExpression.description: The comparison expression to be used in the report.

name.description: The name of the column to use in comparison.

operator.description: The operator to use for comparison.

values.description: Array of values to use for comparison

ViewListResult.description: Result of listing views. It contains a list of available views.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

View.description: States and configurations of Cost Analysis.

displayName.description: User input name of the view. Required.

scope.description: Cost Management scope to save the view on. This includes 'subscriptions/{subscriptionId}' for subscription scope, 'subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resourceGroup scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/departments/{departmentId}' for Department scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/enrollmentAccounts/{enrollmentAccountId}' for EnrollmentAccount scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for BillingProfile scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for InvoiceSection scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroupId}' for Management Group scope, '/providers/Microsoft.CostManagement/externalBillingAccounts/{externalBillingAccountName}' for ExternalBillingAccount scope, and '/providers/Microsoft.CostManagement/externalSubscriptions/{externalSubscriptionName}' for ExternalSubscription scope.

createdOn.description: Date the user created this view.

modifiedOn.description: Date when the user last modified this view.

chart.description: Chart type of the main view in Cost Analysis. Required.

metric.description: Metric to use when displaying costs.

kpis.description: List of KPIs to show in Cost Analysis UI.

pivots.description: Configuration of 3 sub-views in the Cost Analysis UI.

KpiProperties.description: Each KPI must contain a 'type' and 'enabled' key.

id.description: ID of resource related to metric (budget).

enabled.description: show the KPI in the UI?

PivotProperties.description: Each pivot must contain a 'type' and 'name'.

type.description: Data type to show in view.

name.description: Data field to show in view.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ErrorResponse.description:
Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message. 

Some Error responses: 

 * 429 TooManyRequests - Request is throttled. Retry after waiting for the time specified in the "x-ms-ratelimit-microsoft.consumption-retry-after" header. 

 * 503 ServiceUnavailable - Service is temporarily unavailable. Retry after waiting for the time specified in the "Retry-After" header.

eTag.description: eTag of the resource. To handle concurrent update scenario, this field will be used to determine whether the user is updating the latest version or not.

DimensionsListResult.description: Result of listing dimensions. It contains a list of available dimensions.

total.description: Total number of data for the dimension.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.
URL to get the next set of alerts results if there are any.

resourceGroupFilter.description: array of resourceGroups to filter by

resourceFilter.description: array of resources to filter by

meterFilter.description: array of meters to filter by

threshold.description: notification threshold percentage as a decimal which activated this alert

operator.description: operator used to compare currentSpend with amount

contactGroups.description: list of action groups to broadcast to

creationTime.description: dateTime in which alert was created

closeTime.description: dateTime in which alert was closed

modificationTime.description: dateTime in which alert was last modified

statusModificationTime.description: dateTime in which the alert status was last modified

DismissAlertPayload.description: The request payload to update an alert

QueryResult.description: Result of query. It contains all columns listed under groupings and aggregation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

OperationListResult.description: Result of listing cost management operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of cost management operations supported by the Microsoft.CostManagement resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

Operation.description: A Cost management REST API operation.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Dimensions, Query.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

timeframe.description: The time frame for pulling data for the forecast. If custom, then a specific time period must be provided.

timePeriod.description: Has time period for pulling data for the forecast.

dataset.description: Has definition for data in this forecast.

includeActualCost.description: a boolean determining if actualCost will be included

includeFreshPartialCost.description: a boolean determining if FreshPartialCost will be included

timeframe.description: The time frame for pulling data for the query. If custom, then a specific time period must be provided.

timePeriod.description: Has time period for pulling data for the query.

dataset.description: Has definition for data in this query.

QueryTimePeriod.description: The start and end date for pulling data for the query.

from.description: The start date to pull data from.

to.description: The end date to pull data to.

QueryDataset.description: The definition of data present in the query.

granularity.description: The granularity of rows in the query.

configuration.description: Has configuration information for the data in the export. The configuration will be ignored if aggregation and grouping are provided.

aggregation.description: Dictionary of aggregation expression to use in the query. The key of each item in the dictionary is the alias for the aggregated column. Query can have up to 2 aggregation clauses.

grouping.description: Array of group by expression to use in the query. Query can have up to 2 group by clauses.

filter.description: Has filter expression to use in the query.

QueryDatasetConfiguration.description: The configuration of dataset in the query.

columns.description: Array of column names to be included in the query. Any valid query column name is allowed. If not provided, then query includes all columns.

QueryAggregation.description: The aggregation expression to be used in the query.

name.description: The name of the column to aggregate.

function.description: The name of the aggregation function to use.

QueryGrouping.description: The group by expression to be used in the query.

type.description: Has type of the column to group.

name.description: The name of the column to group.

QueryFilter.description: The filter expression to be used in the export.

and.description: The logical "AND" expression. Must have at least 2 items.

or.description: The logical "OR" expression. Must have at least 2 items.

dimension.description: Has comparison expression for a dimension

tag.description: Has comparison expression for a tag

QueryColumnType.description: The type of the column in the export.

QueryComparisonExpression.description: The comparison expression to be used in the query.

name.description: The name of the column to use in comparison.

operator.description: The operator to use for comparison.

values.description: Array of values to use for comparison

ExportListResult.description: Result of listing exports. It contains a list of available exports in the scope provided.

schedule.description: Has schedule information for the export.

CommonExportProperties.description: The common properties of the export.

format.description: The format of the export being delivered.

deliveryInfo.description: Has delivery information for the export.

ExportSchedule.description: The schedule associated with a export.

status.description: The status of the schedule. Whether active or not. If inactive, the export's scheduled execution is paused.

recurrencePeriod.description: Has start and end date of the recurrence. The start date must be in future. If present, the end date must be greater than start date.

ExportDeliveryInfo.description: The delivery information associated with a export.

destination.description: Has destination for the export being delivered.

ExportRecurrencePeriod.description: The start and end date for recurrence schedule.

ExportDeliveryDestination.description: The destination information for the delivery of the export. To allow access to a storage account, you must register the account's subscription with the Microsoft.CostManagementExports resource provider. This is required once per subscription. When creating an export in the Azure portal, it is done automatically, however API users need to register the subscription. For more information see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/resource-manager-supported-services .

resourceId.description: The resource id of the storage account where exports will be delivered.

container.description: The name of the container where exports will be uploaded.

rootFolderPath.description: The name of the directory where exports will be uploaded.

ExportExecutionListResult.description: Result of listing exports execution history of a export by name

ExportExecutionProperties.description: The properties of the export execution.

executionType.description: The type of the export execution.

status.description: The status of the export execution.

submittedBy.description: The identifier for the entity that executed the export. For OnDemand executions, it is the email id. For Scheduled executions, it is the constant value - System.

submittedTime.description: The time when export was queued to be executed.

processingStartTime.description: The time when export was picked up to be executed.

processingEndTime.description: The time when export execution finished.

fileName.description: The name of the file export got written to.

scopeViewParameter.name: scope
scopeViewParameter.description: The scope associated with view operations. This includes 'subscriptions/{subscriptionId}' for subscription scope, 'subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resourceGroup scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/departments/{departmentId}' for Department scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/enrollmentAccounts/{enrollmentAccountId}' for EnrollmentAccount scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for BillingProfile scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for InvoiceSection scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroupId}' for Management Group scope, 'providers/Microsoft.CostManagement/externalBillingAccounts/{externalBillingAccountName}' for External Billing Account scope and 'providers/Microsoft.CostManagement/externalSubscriptions/{externalSubscriptionName}' for External Subscription scope.

scopeDimensionParameter.name: scope
scopeDimensionParameter.description: The scope associated with dimension operations. This includes '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for subscription scope, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resourceGroup scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/departments/{departmentId}' for Department scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/enrollmentAccounts/{enrollmentAccountId}' for EnrollmentAccount scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroupId}' for Management Group scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for billingProfile scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for invoiceSection scope, and 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/customers/{customerId}' specific for partners.

scopeAlertParameter.name: scope
scopeAlertParameter.description: The scope associated with alerts operations. This includes '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for subscription scope, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resourceGroup scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope and '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/departments/{departmentId}' for Department scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/enrollmentAccounts/{enrollmentAccountId}' for EnrollmentAccount scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroupId} for Management Group scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for billingProfile scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for invoiceSection scope, and '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/customers/{customerId}' specific for partners.

scopeForecastParameter.name: scope
scopeForecastParameter.description: The scope associated with forecast operations. This includes '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for subscription scope, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resourceGroup scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope and '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/departments/{departmentId}' for Department scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/enrollmentAccounts/{enrollmentAccountId}' for EnrollmentAccount scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroupId} for Management Group scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for billingProfile scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for invoiceSection scope, and '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/customers/{customerId}' specific for partners.

scopeQueryParameter.name: scope
scopeQueryParameter.description: The scope associated with query and export operations. This includes '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/' for subscription scope, '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}' for resourceGroup scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope and '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/departments/{departmentId}' for Department scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/enrollmentAccounts/{enrollmentAccountId}' for EnrollmentAccount scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroupId} for Management Group scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for billingProfile scope, '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for invoiceSection scope, and '/providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/customers/{customerId}' specific for partners.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2019-11-01.

externalCloudProviderTypeParameter.name: externalCloudProviderType
externalCloudProviderTypeParameter.description: The external cloud provider type associated with dimension/query operations. This includes 'externalSubscriptions' for linked account and 'externalBillingAccounts' for consolidated account.

externalCloudProviderIdParameter.name: externalCloudProviderId
externalCloudProviderIdParameter.description: This can be '{externalSubscriptionId}' for linked account or '{externalBillingAccountId}' for consolidated account used with dimension/query operations.
